alert.note: Alert for East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; West Feliciana (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 9:28PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern West Feliciana, southwestern East Feliciana and northwestern East Baton Rouge Parishes through 1000 PM CDT... At 928 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Slaughter, or near Jackson. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Zachary, Baker, Jackson and Slaughter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: East Baton Rouge; East Feliciana; West Feliciana
